tool_description: All news about crypto. Tweets, listing news, .gov announcements, blogs etc.
name: ALL Crypto News Feed
title: ALL Crypto News Feed

api_list.name: Get Blogs Feed
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-crypto-news-feed.p.rapidapi.com/get_blogs_feed"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-crypto-news-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
